name: Glimpse: Puzzle demo
description:
Get the right emotions to the right target squares. For every emotion in the right square, a green box is shown. For every emotion that belongs in a square but is in the wrong one, a yellow box is shown. 

Controls:

Left click to move an emotion. Emotions can only move in the following way

Happy/Passion: Left and Right

Calm/Caution: Up and Down

Curious: Diagonal

Right click to destroy an emotion an spawn another one.
